name: Flappy Tunki
description:
Hi guys, we are Lazy Factory, we want to show you our next mobile game!.

Now you can take a look at our GitHub!! 

link: https://github.com/TemmermanC/FlappyTunki

We're now introducing Ads to our project. This time we wanted to give you some rewards by watching these Ads. Sadly we managed to incorporate the Ads system but not the rewards. However don't worry at the 2.0 v we're planning on improving all these errors, so please be patient with us!

Here are some skins that we're planning to add:

Halloween version of Tunki.

Christmas Tunki!
